Detailed Description

This is the interface used to store vertex state for delayed rendering.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual Moo::VertexSnapshot::~VertexSnapshot (  )  [inline, virtual]

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Moo::VertexSnapshot::fini (  )  [pure virtual]

This method is called when the delayed renderer has finished drawing.

Vertex snapshot often hold external references to make sure their source data remains in scope until this point.

Implemented in Moo::RigidMorphVertexSnapshot, Moo::SkinnedMorphVertexSnapshot, Moo::RigidVertexSnapshot, and Moo::SkinnedVertexSnapshot.

virtual bool Moo::VertexSnapshot::getVertexDepths ( uint32  startVertex,
uint32  nVertices,
float *  pOutDepths 
) [pure virtual]

This method is called by the delayed renderer (within channel) to enable the triangles to be sorted.

returns true if the resource has been updated (so we know if we can the last buffer again or not)

Implemented in Moo::RigidMorphVertexSnapshot, Moo::SkinnedMorphVertexSnapshot, Moo::RigidVertexSnapshot, and Moo::SkinnedVertexSnapshot.

bool  staticLighting

This method is called by the delayed renderer to prepare vertices for drawing.
